definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Electrophoretic coating process on the aluminium alloy support used for solar energy heat unit is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了太阳能热水器铝合金托架的电泳涂漆工艺。

sentences.english: High-efficiency water heaters can drive down home energy costs.
sentences.chinese: 高效节能热水器可以大大降低家庭能源费用。

sentences.english: The design of digital automatic temperature control water-heater is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了数字式自动控温热水器的设计思想。

sentences.english: The unit shall be equipped with a standard 120V plug-in cord.
sentences.chinese: 这种热水器应该配置一个标准的120伏插头电缆。

sentences.english: This will suck air in as water drains during use.
sentences.chinese: 它的作用是在热水器使用中水流出的时候吸入空气。

sentences.english: Products are mainly Gas Water Heaters and Gas Cookers.
sentences.chinese: 产品主要包括燃气快速热水器和燃气灶具。

sentences.english: Maybe  you  don't  believe  me, but  try  to go without a water heater for just one day.
sentences.chinese: 也许你不相信我，但试试看没有热水器过一天。

sentences.english: The second part of the solar water heater holds the water for the system.
sentences.chinese: 太阳能热水器的另一部分为储水系统。

sentences.english: Only turn the water heater on when necessary, and adjust temperature controls to avoid overheating.
sentences.chinese: 热水器不用就别开，控制温度不要过热。

sentences.english: The invention can be widely applied to water heaters and moderate-high temperature heat utilization systems.
sentences.chinese: 可以广泛应用到热水器及中高温热利用系统中。

sentences.english: Research on thermal efficiency forecast method of solar water heaters.
sentences.chinese: 太阳能热水器的热效率预测方法研究。

sentences.english: The gravity feed batch solar heater is very simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 重力供水太阳能热水器的操作方法很简单。

sentences.english: Use a cover to insulate the water heater.
sentences.chinese: 使用隔离罩的电热水器。

sentences.english: The problems of high consumed energy and unsafety of the existing water heater is mainly solved.
sentences.chinese: 主要解决现有热水器耗能高或不够安全的问题。

sentences.english: Electric water heaters are installed near the changing and clothing rooms for supplying hot water for shower and washing.
sentences.chinese: 在更衣间旁设置电热水器，为淋浴和洗盥供应热水。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
bathroom infrared heater, marketed as "bath master"
